com.planner.desafio.bean

Class FuncionarioBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.planner.desafio.bean.FuncionarioBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @ViewScoped
public class FuncionarioBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Representa um managed bean resolvendo as requisições entre a view e a classe de entidade (Funcionario).
    Author:
    Gilmar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
